Name: The Corpse's Whiskers
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar to 1 water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Mickey Britton, the creator of this drink describes it as "the missing link between three classic cocktails: Corpse Reviver No.2 , a Satan's Whiskers and the infamous Sidecar ."
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Mickey Britton at Public House, Islington, London, England. Corpse Reviver history and recipe variations
Nutrition: One serving of The Corpse's Whiskers contains 149 calories
